title: Summer Festival
description: Annual summer celebration with music, food, and family activities. Join us for a weekend of fun in the sun with live entertainment, local food vendors, and activities for all ages.

sections.title: Music Stage
sections.description: Live performances by local and regional bands throughout the weekend.

sections.title: Food Court
sections.description: Sample delicious offerings from over 20 local food vendors.

sections.title: Kids Zone
sections.description: Fun activities for children including face painting, bounce houses, and games.

title: Golf Tournament
description: Community golf tournament at Country Club Golf Course. Players of all skill levels are welcome to participate in this friendly competition.

sections.title: Pro Division
sections.description: For experienced golfers with handicaps under 12.

sections.title: Amateur Division
sections.description: For casual golfers of all skill levels.

title: Pickleball Tournament
description: Local pickleball tournament for all skill levels. Singles and doubles competitions available.

sections.title: Singles Competition
sections.description: Individual players compete in age and skill-based brackets.

sections.title: Doubles Competition
sections.description: Team-based competition in various skill levels.

sections.title: Mixed Doubles
sections.description: Co-ed teams compete in a friendly tournament.

title: Harvest Fair
description: Celebration of local agriculture with produce contests, farm exhibits, and traditional harvest games.

sections.title: Produce Competition
sections.description: Showcase your garden's best fruits and vegetables in our annual contest.

sections.title: Farm Equipment Display
sections.description: View historic and modern farm equipment from local farmers and collectors.

sections.title: Livestock Showcase
sections.description: Local farmers showcase their prize livestock.

title: Winter Festival
description: Celebrate the winter season with ice sculptures, holiday markets, and seasonal entertainment.

sections.title: Holiday Market
sections.description: Shop for unique gifts from local artisans and vendors.

sections.title: Ice Sculpture Contest
sections.description: Watch local artists create beautiful ice sculptures or enter the contest yourself.

sections.title: Holiday Performances
sections.description: Enjoy seasonal music and performances from local choirs and musicians.
